&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000)
select top 0 tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(a.ma_vi_tri) as ma_vi_tri, 0 as vi_tri_yn, rtrim(a.ma_lo) as ma_lo, b.lo_yn, b.sua_tk_vt, b.gia_ton, a.gia_nt, rtrim(a.ma_vt) as ma_vt, rtrim(a.ma_kho) as ma_kho, a.so_luong as ton13, rtrim(a.dvt) as dvt, a.ngay_ct, rtrim(a.tk_du) as tk_du, a.stt_rec_nm, a.stt_rec0nm, a.nm_so, a.nm_ln, cast('' as char(13)) as stt_rec_dh, cast('' as char(3)) as stt_rec0dh, cast('' as varchar(32)) as dh_so, cast(0 as int) as dh_ln &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery;&BI.PO.Flow.Query;&BI.FlowOA.GetOtherFields;&BI.FlowSA.GetOtherFields; into #d from #tagRow tr cross join d74$000000 a cross join dmvt b
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(a.ma_vi_tri), case when exists(select top 1 ma_kho from dmvitri z where z.ma_kho = a.ma_kho) then 1 else 0 end, rtrim(a.ma_lo), b.lo_yn, b.sua_tk_vt, b.gia_ton, a.gia_nt, rtrim(a.ma_vt), rtrim(a.ma_kho), 0, rtrim(a.dvt), a.ngay_ct, rtrim(a.tk_du), a.stt_rec_nm, a.stt_rec0nm, a.nm_so, a.nm_ln, '''', '''', '''', 0 &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery;&BI.PO.Flow.Query;&BI.FlowOA.GetOtherFields;&BI.FlowSA.GetOtherFields; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join d74$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt ' select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end
select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, stt_rec_dh, stt_rec0dh, dh_so, dh_ln into #r from d96$000000 select distinct a.stt_rec, b.stt_rec0nm, convert(char(6), a.ngay_ct, 112) as ky into #pnm from c96$000000 a join #d b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec_nm
select @p = min(ky) from #pnm while @p is not null begin set @q = 'insert into #r select a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, a.stt_rec_dh, a.stt_rec0dh, a.dh_so, a.dh_ln' set @q = @q + ' from d96$' + @p + ' a join #pnm b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0nm and isnull(a.stt_rec_dh, '''') <> ''''' exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(ky) from #pnm where ky > @p end
update #d set stt_rec_dh = b.stt_rec_dh, stt_rec0dh = b.stt_rec0dh, dh_so = b.dh_so, dh_ln = b.dh_ln from #d a join #r b on a.stt_rec_nm = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0nm = b.stt_rec0
&FlowMultiUpdateCurrentStock; select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
